body_html:
To run on a single core OMP_NUM_THREADS=1 indeed creates a single thread but it is migrated between the cores too often for some reason. If setting the affinity to a single core, the best performance is achieved.

OMP_NUM_THREADS=1 taskset -c 0 ./1.py
Time: 314.611275 us (std: 29.617539 us)

To run on a single core `OMP_NUM_THREADS=1` indeed creates a single thread but it is migrated between the cores too often for some reason. If setting the affinity to a single core, the best performance is achieved.

`OMP_NUM_THREADS=1 taskset -c 0 ./1.py`
Time: 314.611275 us (std: 29.617539 us)
